segments.text: Oh , yes , it is . Thank you . I was looking for it just now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You look a bit familiar to me . I wonder if I have seen you somewhere before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I ask where you live ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just two blocks away , in that tall building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s it . I live there , too . I live on the sixth floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My family move in just two weeks ago . We live on the fourth floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a small world ! May I know your name , miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do , Miss Chen ? I ’ m Song Mei .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m glad to meet you , Mr . Song .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going to your office now , Miss Chen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I ’ m going to the airport to meet some friends from Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2
